resources.string:
1. To take all reasonable care to avoid loss of or damage to the equipment.

 2. In the event of theft, inform the police immediately and advise Paul Underhill as soon as reasonably practical.

 3. If the equipment is returned without all of its accessories, charges may apply.

 5. During periods of high demand, we reserve the right to recall equipment for the next due date and failure to return your items may result in fines.

 6. By agreeing to these conditions, you assume liability for any costs resulting from loss or damage caused to the equipment while it is in your care.

 7. You are not authorised to take any equipment outside of the UK.

 8. University of Chester computer policy applies
